channel.title: Putting in shops
channel.description:
ok i have shops on the server but i dont like where they are :|
do i change the cords of the shops in java.client or in npc handler? i have look and look and i havnt found. :mad: ... in java.client i have found a list of shops and it does not have cords listed in the code.
I dont know if i have to delete the existing shops and i dont know how if i do need to do that :confused:
Some please help Greatly apprieceted

@Keasho wrote:

hippie:

er… no real way to do it accuatly… you could go to item.cfg… and mess around with some numbers… the really long numbers that look like 2121272.2143124214

ahh ok ty, i would rep you but i dont know how

kk thanks ill try it out
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 07:14:28 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know how to set the price on an item in a shop?

item.title: Putting in shops
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok well. go to client.java. try serching wanneshop

it will take you to the part that gives an npc a shop. after you find the npc id, look in autospawn, for the npc id and serch his coards. if you want to make it so teh shop is in… say a shop area change his coards to the shop areas coards.

Read full topic
